languages.text: {n}Соломон понимающе кивает:{/n} "Согласен, слова излишни. Пора уже высаживаться на Эпитафию и встретить последнее испытание".
{n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон понимающе кивает:{/n} "Согласен, слова излишни. Пора уже высаживаться на Эпитафию и встретить последнее испытание".

{n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは心得たようにうなずいた。{/n}「確かに、もはや言葉は不要です。今こそエピタフへ降り、最後の試練に臨む時です」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは心得たようにうなずいた。{/n}「確かに、もはや言葉は不要です。今こそエピタフへ降り、最後の試練に臨む時です」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt verstehend.{/n} "Ich stimme zu – Worte sind unnötig. Es ist Zeit, uns auf Epitaph der letzten Prüfung zu stellen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nickt verstehend.{/n} "Ich stimme zu – Worte sind unnötig. Es ist Zeit, uns auf Epitaph der letzten Prüfung zu stellen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne hoche la tête.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Les mots sont superflus. Il est temps de nous rendre sur Épitaphe afin d'affronter cette dernière épreuve. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hoche la tête.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Les mots sont superflus. Il est temps de nous rendre sur Épitaphe afin d'affronter cette dernière épreuve. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente comprensivamente.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo: huelgan las palabras. Ha llegado la hora de bajar a Epitafio y afrontar el desafío final».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente comprensivamente.{/n} «Estoy de acuerdo: huelgan las palabras. Ha llegado la hora de bajar a Epitafio y afrontar el desafío final».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙会意地点点头。{/n}“我同意，这种时候不需要多说什么。是时候前往荒垄碑碣，面对最后的考验了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙会意地点点头。{/n}“我同意，这种时候不需要多说什么。是时候前往荒垄碑碣，面对最后的考验了。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne anlayışla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Katılıyorum, kelimeler gereksiz. Sinyazıt'a inip son imtihanımızla yüzleşme zamanı."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne nods in understanding.{/n} "I agree — words are unnecessary. It's time to descend to Epitaph and face the final test."
